mapper.select: select r.zzno, r.rno, m.nick, r.cont, date_format(cdt, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), r.re_like, r.report, r.mno, m.pic, r.reparent, r.reorder, (select count(*) from reply where reparent = r.rno) as repacnt, (select count(*) from reply_memb where rno = #{replyNumber}) as re_like from memb m join reply r on m.mno = r.mno where re_like >= 3 and zzno = #{zzalnumber} order by re_like desc limit 3

select r.zzno, r.rno, m.nick, r.cont, date_format(cdt, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i'), r.re_like, r.report, r.mno, m.pic, r.reparent, r.reorder, (select count(*) from reply where reparent = r.rno) as repacnt, (select count(*) from reply_memb where rno = #{replyNumber}) as re_like from memb m join reply r on m.mno = r.mno where zzno = #{zzalnumber} order by if(isnull(reparent), rno, reparent) desc, reorder
mapper.insert: insert into reply(cont, cdt, re_like, report, zzno, mno, reorder) values(#{content}, current_timestamp(), #{replyLike}, #{report}, #{zzalnumber}, #{memberNumber}, 1)

select max(reorder)+1 from reply where reparent = #{replyNumber} or rno = #{replyNumber}
insert into reply (cont, cdt, re_like, report, zzno, mno, reparent, reorder) values(#{content}, current_timestamp(), #{replyLike}, #{report}, #{zzalnumber}, #{memberNumber}, #{replyNumber}, #{replyOrderNumber})
mapper.delete: delete from reply_memb where rno = #{replyNumber} or repno = #{replyNumber};
delete from reply where rno=#{replyNumber} or reparent=#{replyNumber};
mapper.update: update reply set re_like = if (re_like=0, 1, 0) where rno=#{replyNumber} and mno=#{memberNumber};
